description: An overview of the Ghost process metrics.

panels.description: The number of times Node.js restarted.
panels.title: Node.js Restarts

panels.description: Number of active handle and active requests.
panels.title: Active Handlers and Requests

panels.description: The number of active connections maintained with the database. These connections can be in use or idle.
panels.title: Connections

panels.description: The number of active connections as a percentage of the maximum allowed by the pool.
panels.title: Pool Utilization

panels.description: The elapsed time a transaction spends waiting for an available connection in the connection pool.
panels.title: Time to Acquire Connection

panels.description: The number of transactions that are currently in the queue waiting to acquire a free connection
panels.title: Pending Acquires

panels.description: The number of connections waiting to be established with the database.
panels.title: Pending Creates

panels.description: The number of queries executed in the trailing 60s.
panels.title: Query Rate

title: Ghost Dashboard
